title: Choosing a liquid hydrogen carrier for sustainable transportation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00731J, Paper
Athanasios A. Tountas, Geoffrey A. Ozin, Mohini M. Sain
The convenient transport of liquid H2 carriers’ from locations ≥10,000 km distance by tanker ships will enable the use of H2 for next generation transportation purposes, provided the techno-economics of doing so are achievable in practice.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
